            Allison Koh
          
          
            
          
          
            
            I am a PhD Candidate at the Centre for International Security, Hertie School and Doctoral Research Fellow at the Berlin Graduate School for Global and Transregional Studies. My research focuses on repressive regimes’ responses to online dissent and applications of natural language processing in political science research.
